Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act of 1952 (8 U.S.C. 1251), relating to the general classes of deportable aliens.
short_title: United States Flag Protection Act of 1981

summary.text: United States Flag Protection Act of 1981 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to include conviction of desecrating the United States flag as a grounds for deportation.

titles.title: United States Flag Protection Act of 1981
A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act of 1952 (8 U.S.C. 1251), relating to the general classes of deportable aliens.
